screen_desc: This screenshot displays the home screen of a smartphone with various app icons. The top row features popular apps like Google Photos, Maps, Gmail, Play Store, and YouTube Kids. Below, additional app icons are displayed, including Adobe Express, Calendar, Camera, Chrome, and Contacts. A search bar is located at the top for quick access to Google search or voice commands. The navigation bar at the bottom includes options for app management, such as opening the app drawer.
